attributes.action: To make Nike Air Max 95's cheaper.
attributes.additional_details: So more people can afford the best shoe on the planet.
attributes.background: Instead of being £175 they should be the same price as the juniors which are £105.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the cost of Nike Air Max 95s are a matter for Nike and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
